title: War
alt: They offered to make me a green beret, but I liked my regular one. Although it gets kind of squashed under my helmet.
transcript:
[A soldier is sitting on the ground behind a low wall, leaning against his pack and writing a letter.]
My Dearest Cordelia,
it has been far too long since I last gazed
upon your lithe and supple body through my
telescopic sights, and I fear you may have
found a superior vantage poin—BLAM! BLAM! BLAM!—a splendid effort, my love, but your shots
find only a decoy, and reveal your position atop
the maintenance shed.I pray this missive and my grenades find you well.War is hell.
